entry.title: Node-Modules configuration options with pnpm
entry.summary: There are many ways to create a nodemodules directory. Your goal must be to create the most strict one but if that is not possible, there are options to make a loose nodemodules as well.

entry.title: Flat node_modules is not the only way
entry.id: Flat node_modules is not the only way
entry.summary: New users of pnpm frequently ask me about the weird structure of node_modules that pnpm creates. Why is it not flat? Where are all the sub-dependencies?
